item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

There’s no way that’s what I gave you…

if(command.startsWith("rebirth")) { for(int j=0; j<21; j++) if(playerLevel[j] >= 99) { setSkillXP(0, j, playerXP[j]) timesDone += 1; showInterface(3559); sendMessage("GOOD LUCK IN THE NEXT LIFE."); yell(playerName+" has rebirthed "+timesDone+" times."); } else { sendMessage("All your skills must be 99."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

ok im making a rebirth system. i have the command but i need help perfecting it.
i need to know if this command itsself is giving me the errors im geting.

if(command.startsWith(“rebirth”)) {
for(int j=0; j<21; j++)
if(playerLevel[j] >= 99) {
setSkillXP(0, j, playerXP[j])
timesDone += 1;
showInterface(3559);
sendMessage(“GOOD LUCK IN THE NEXT LIFE.”);
yell(playerName+" has rebirthed “+timesDone+” times.");
{ else { sendMessage(“All your skills must be 99.”); }
}
}

also im using the ddsspeced v2, i think that its the 317 v2.5 and am wondering if someone can help me add the timesdone into charactersaving and all that stuff.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 04:43:28 pm[/size][hr]does anyone know what to do here?
